Texts.Eng: In the first slot, place a seed. In the second, place a liquid to feed the plant with. The third slot is for fertilizer. ^orange;Different fertilizers^reset; will result in ^orange;different production and growth rates^reset; for plants.

While you can farm the old-fashioned way with a hoe , dirt and your own two hands there is another option: ^orange;Growing Trays^reset;. Build one of these at a ^orange;Foraging Table^reset; now, and you'll have some plants grown in no time.
